sentences.en: A surprise that he was unable to hide registered on his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸上露出掩饰不住的惊讶的表情.

sentences.en: Article 10 provides that all businesses must be registered correctly.
sentences.cn: 第十款规定所有的企业必须正确地登记注冊.

sentences.en: Have you registered the birth of your baby?
sentences.cn: 你给婴儿的出生登记了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He asked his mother to send it by registered mail.
sentences.cn: 他让他妈妈用挂号邮件寄。

sentences.en: His face registered both surprise and joy.
sentences.cn: 他脸上显露出惊喜交集的表情.

sentences.en: How many members have officially registered in the club?
sentences.cn: 该俱乐部正式登记的会员有多少?

sentences.en: I registered that she was late.
In former times, only property owners could be registered as voters.
sentences.cn: 从前, 只有有财产的人才能登记作选民.

sentences.en: Is the domain name already registered or still available?
sentences.cn: 该域名已经被注册还是仍然可用？

sentences.en: Ships were registered abroad to circumvent employment and safety regulation.
sentences.cn: 船只在外国注册以逃避有关雇佣和安全的规定.

sentences.en: The National Trust is a registered charity.
sentences.cn: 全国托管协会是个已注册的慈善机构。

sentences.en: The patient was registered under a false name.
sentences.cn: 那位患者挂号时用了假名。

sentences.en: The scales registered a gain of 1.3 kilograms.
The trademark is registered on the book of the Patent Office.
sentences.cn: 该商标已在专利局登记注册.

sentences.en: Thousands have registered with unemployment offices.
sentences.cn: 已有数千人在失业管理处作了登记。

words.tran_cn: 登记；注册；记录；寄存器；登记簿
登记员；注册主任；专科住院医师
注册；登记处；挂号处；船舶的国籍
登记；注册；记录；挂号邮寄；把…挂号；正式提出
注册的；记名的；登记过的；（家畜等）附有血统证明的

phrases.tran_cn: 注册设计；已注册外观专利
注册办公所在地；法定总公司办公地

trans.tran_cn: 注册的，登记过的，已挂号的，（动物）附有血统证明的
trans.tran_en: A registered letter or package is sent by a special postal service, for which you pay extra money for insurance in case it gets lost
